      • instance

        private static volatile DatabaseManager instance
        Instance of DatabaseManager class.
        See Also:
        getInstance()

      • builders

        private final java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,<any>> builders
        Map that saves all builders used by the database, so when stopping all files can be saved. (Not sure if it is a good idea to keep all that builders in memory all the time.)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseManager

        private DatabaseManager()
        Initialises when getInstance() is called. It checks for the existence of paths and creates them when needed.
        See Also:
        getInstance()

        public void setUserState(java.lang.Integer userId,
                         boolean userActive)
                  throws DatabaseException
        User got active or inactive. Saves user state to its configuration file.
        Parameters:
        userId - UserID which state changed.
        userActive - State that is to be set.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • validLanguage

        private boolean validLanguage(java.lang.String language)
        Check if the passed language is registered in the config files (to make sure that a file containing translations exists).
        Parameters:
        language - The string to check if it represents a valid language.
        Returns:
        true if the language is considered valid, false otherwise

      • getConfiguration

        private FileBasedConfiguration getConfiguration(java.nio.file.Path configurationFile)
                                         throws DatabaseException
        Gets the configuration for a file on which operations take place. This methods automates getting of the builder.
        Parameters:
        configurationFile - File from where the configuration is loaded.
        Returns:
        FileBasedConfigurationBuilder for the file.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
        See Also:
        set configuration for a user, set configuration for a question, set configuration for a display file

      • getConfiguration

        private FileBasedConfiguration getConfiguration(java.lang.Integer userID)
                                         throws DatabaseException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        FileBasedConfigurationBuilder of the user.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
        See Also:

      • createConfigurationFile

        public void createConfigurationFile(java.nio.file.Path file)
                             throws DatabaseException

        Parameters:

        Throws:

        DatabaseException

      • createUser

        private void createUser(java.lang.Integer userID)
                 throws DatabaseException
        Creates a configuration file for a user. The files are created in the users subdirectory of the bot database. userID is used as name for the file, so a configuration file has a unique name.
        Parameters:
        userID - The name of the configuration file.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • getDatabaseUserPath

        public java.nio.file.Path getDatabaseUserPath(java.lang.Integer userID)
        Adds the default prefix for user configuration files and the userID together.
        Parameters:
        userID - Name of the configuration file the path refers to.
        Returns:
        Path to the configuration file of user with userID.

      • getDatabaseQuestionPath

        Returns:
        Path to the configuration file of question with questionID.

      • setUserCommandState

        public void setUserCommandState(java.lang.Integer userID,
                                java.lang.String state)
                         throws DatabaseException
        Saves at which step of a command loop a user is.
        Parameters:
        userID - UserID of the user which's state is saved.
        state - The step the user is. Can have the value of one of the '*COMMAND*' Strings in Config.Bot.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
        See Also:
        Bot.ASK_COMMAND_WRITE_QUESTION, Bot.NO_COMMAND, Bot.ANSWER_COMMAND_CHOOSE_NUMBER, Bot.ANSWER_COMMAND_WRITE_ANSWER, Bot.PIN_PICTURE_COMMAND_SEND_DESCRIPTION, Bot.PIN_PICTURE_COMMAND_SEND_TITLE, Bot.PIN_PICTURE_COMMAND_SEND_PICTURE, Bot.PIN_PICTURE_COMMAND_SEND_DURATION, Look up the command state.

      • createQuestion

        public void createQuestion(java.lang.String question,
                           java.lang.Long chatID)
                    throws DatabaseException
        Creates a new question. The question's ID is one bigger than the number of existing files.
        Parameters:
        question - The text of the question.
        chatID - The chatID of the chat in which the question was asked.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
        See Also:
        Get a question's text., Read all questions from questions subdirectory., Get the chatID of a question., Get all chatID's of questions., Get the number of all existing questions., Delete a question., Deletes all questions.

                    throws DatabaseException

        Parameters:
        questionID - The question that will be deleted.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
        See Also:

      • deleteQuestions

        public void deleteQuestions()
                     throws DatabaseException

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error deleting a file.
        DatabaseException
        See Also:
        Get a question's text., Read all questions from questions subdirectory., Create a new question., Get the chatID of a question., Get all chatID's of questions., Get the number of all existing questions., Delete a question.

      • setCurrentPictureTitle

        public void setCurrentPictureTitle(java.lang.Integer userID,
                                   java.lang.String title)
                            throws DatabaseException,
                                   java.nio.file.FileAlreadyExistsException
        Saves currentPictureTitle in the configuration file of a user.
        Parameters:
        userID - User for who the value is saved.
        title - The title that is to be saved.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
        java.nio.file.FileAlreadyExistsException
        See Also:
        Read the currentPictureTitle.

      • createNewDisplayFile

        public void createNewDisplayFile(AbsSender absSender,
                                 User user,
                                 java.lang.String fileId,
                                 java.lang.String type,
                                 java.lang.String tgType)
                          throws DatabaseException
        Download the file to display and add it together with its properties to the configuration files.
        Parameters:
        absSender - Used to get the file to download.
        user - Used to identify which title, etc. should be set.
        fileId - Used to get the file.
        type - Used to differentiate between the download methods.
        tgType - Differentiate between videos, images and images sent as documents.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • deleteDisplayFile

        public void deleteDisplayFile(java.lang.String name)
                       throws DatabaseException
        Wrapper for deleting display files that have not been uploaded by the admin so the userId is unknown for the command.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file that should be deleted.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
        See Also:
        The method that is deleting the display files.

      • deleteDisplayFile

        public void deleteDisplayFile(java.lang.Integer userId,
                              java.lang.String name)
                       throws DatabaseException
        Delete a display file by removing it from the databases for display files and deleting the files.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user id of the user who uploaded the file.
        name - The name of the file that is going to be deleted.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
        See Also:
        A wrapper for this method when the user id is unknown., Remove display files from the databases.
